short_summary: Acquisition and delivery of a backhoe to the Quebec Waterways Field Unit of Parks Canada Agency
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Quebec Waterways Field Unit of Parks Canada Agency, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition and delivery of a backhoe. All bids must be submitted by 2 PM EST on January 11, 2023.
full_summary:
**5P214-220189: Request for Proposal for the Acquisition and Delivery of a Backhoe**

**Reference Number:** WS3779419558
**Publication Date:** December 12, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 11, 2023 at 14:00 HNE

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition and delivery of a backhoe in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.

**Notice Details:**

*   **UNSPSC Codes:** 22101500 (Earth moving machinery), 24000000 (Material Handling and Conditioning and Storage Machinery and their Accessories and Supplies), and 24101600 (Lifting equipment and accessories)
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others listed in the notice
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Montreal, Quebec, Canada

**Proposal Submission Details:**

*   **Required Supporting Documentation and Bid Submission:** All required documents and bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 HNE on January 11, 2023.
*   **Contact Information:** Refer to the Contact Information section below for details.

**Contact Information:**
Renee-Ann Therien, PWGSC
Email: [renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14874038?extsite=MTQ4NzQwMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

THIS NOTICE AND ALL DOCUMENTS REFERENCED HEREIN ARE SUBJECT TO THE PROVISIONS OF THE CANADA TRADE AGREEMENT AND OTHER APPLICABLE LAWS. BY PARTICIPATING IN THIS PROCUREMENT PROCESS, OFFERORS AGREE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS NOTICE AND ALL APPLICABLE LAWS. Access to the solicitation is restricted to registered users. Suppliers must be registered in the Government of Canada's supplier registration system, Ariba, to be able to enter the bidding information accurately.
